Docs.summary: called once per frame. time a value between 0 and 1
Docs.remarks: <para>called once per frame. time a value between 0 and 1</para><para>For example:<list type="bullet"><item><description>0 means that the action just started</description></item><item><description>0.5 means that the action is in the middle</description></item><item><description>1 means that the action is over </description></item></list></para><list type="bullet"> <item> <description>0 means that the action just started</description> </item> <item> <description>0.5 means that the action is in the middle</description> </item> <item> <description>1 means that the action is over </description> </item> </list><para>0 means that the action just started</para><para>0.5 means that the action is in the middle</para><para>1 means that the action is over </para>
